verses.verse: A song of ascents. Those who put their trust in the LORD are like Mount Zion, which cannot be shaken but stands fast forever.[b]
As the mountains surround Jerusalem, so the LORD surrounds his people both now and forevermore.[c]
The scepter of the wicked will not prevail over the land allotted to the righteous, so that the righteous will not be tempted to turn their hands to evil.[d]
[e]Do good, O LORD, to those who are good, to those who are upright of heart.[f]
But the LORD will assign to the ranks of the evildoers those who turn their hearts to wickedness.[g] May peace be granted to Israel.
